snippet.title: Game & Watch - Donkey Kong Jr. (New Wide Screen) (c)1982 Nintendo [MAME emulation footage]
snippet.description:
This is the "New Wide Screen" release of Donkey Kong Jr., part of the Game & Watch series from Nintendo.  Emulation provided by Algestam and co.

There was also a Panorama Donkey Kong Jr. unit with different gameplay and enhanced sound.

Game & Watch artwork for MAME was done by DarthMarino (more recently emulated units) and hydef (units emulated before 2020)
https://drive.google.com/drive/u/1/folders/1vl9O-0jIGCHHY_lrWpOwBtqTXEKsVGOY  DarthMarino 
https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1WLKcvynl0ky2mRL1UacA9yaiMTnNs4x5 hydef
